PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-00242013-01-31,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActProceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING REGULATIONS in order to improve Canada's compliance with the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) Recommendation 5 and avoid being moved to the FATF's enhanced follow-up process where Canada could be subject to enhanced measures as a result of deficiencies identified in its anti-money laundering and anti-terrorist financing regime.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0015 Publication Date: 2013-02-13
AttachmentsAttachment
